HiddenText.Name: CE summer session Q10
HiddenText.OpenningText: May Summer Session students obtain a BYU-Idaho ID card, use the Hart Building, and have BYU-Idaho student health insurance?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
• A student ID card may be obtained at the Manwaring Center in room 162. (Bring your photo ID.)
  • To use the Hart Building, visit the Hart Rules and Standards page.
  • BYU-Idaho health insurance is available to admitted full-time students only.
